short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's you seamlessly switch between different accounts of a broker. Now you can also save and login automatically to brokers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly switch between multiple accounts across different brokers without the hassle of logging in and out repeatedly. Whether you're managing multiple accounts on Fyers, Zerodha or Dhan, this extension streamlines your trading experience, letting you quickly toggle between accounts in just a few clicks. Stay connected to the markets without interruption and manage your portfolios with ease. Perfect for active traders with multiple accounts across these three popular brokers!

Now you can also save your login information to automatically login everyday.

New Updates (v1.0.3)
1) Automated Logins

Features:
1) Add multiple logins to same browser window for Fyers, Zerodha and Dhan
2) Save logins and automate logins to skip the hassle of logging in everyday
3) Keyboard shortcuts for switching between accounts easily (User Ctrl + Shift + Up or Ctrl + Shift + Down on broker url)
